articles.title: First West African case of deadly Marburg virus detected: WHO - Jakarta Post
articles.description: The virus, which is carried by bats and has a fatality rate of up to 88 percent, was found in samples taken from a patient who died on August 2 in southern Gueckedou prefecture, the WHO said.
